trans-unit.source: The 'dotnet tool search' command unconditionally accesses nuget.org to find tools, but it is not present in your nuget.config. Add it to run this command. This can be done with this command: dotnet nuget add source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json -n nuget.org

Isso pode ser feito com este comando: dotnet nuget add source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json -n nuget.org
